name: Spoon Feed Ya Nan!
description:
Spoon Feed Ya Nan was created by Studio Spandex and Sombrero. Which comprises of four students from Priestley College in Warrington UK. Luke Oldfield, Joe Walker, Callum Donaghy and Ryan Beech are second year students taking a Btec in Game Design. This is their first attempt at a Game Jam ran over 4 day by Game Design graduates. The Students had 28 hours of directed time to design and build from scratch.

Directed more at humour the idea of Spoon Feed Ya Nan is to get as much food into Nan as Possible without knocking her teeth out. But not all the food is healthy or right for Nan.
